articles.author: Bill Roberson
articles.title: Torture Test: We Took Brompton’s Folding Electric Ebike To The Hills Of San Francisco - Forbes
articles.description: The somewhat nerdy Brompton folding bike is a hot seller in Britain, and now they've added a battery and motor. Can it conquer one of America's most notorious urban bike challenges?
articles.content:
